description: Originally from Morocco and also found in Provence, this easy dish tastes as good as it smells. Serve with a salad for a quick lunch, or tapas-style with cocktail sticks.
name: Moroccanstyle Prawns Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the gambas on a double layer of kitchen paper. Heat the oil in a large frying pan, tip in the spices and garlic, and stir for a minute to release the flavors.

Add the gambas and cook for 12 minutes over a medium-high heat until they turn a little pink, then turn over. Cook until the gambas are pink all over, stirring frequently. Stir in the herbs and serve hot.
